text: "Blowin' in the Wind" is an anti-war song written by Bob Dylan. He wrote it in 1962. It was put on his second album, The Freewheelin' Bob Dylan (1963). In 1994, the song was put in the Grammy Hall of Fame. Rolling Stone magazine said it was one of the 500 Greatest Songs of All Time. == References == Category:1963 songs Category:Folk songs Category:Bob Dylan songs Category:Stevie Wonder songs Category:Peter, Paul and Mary songs Category:Glen Campbell songs Category:Dolly Parton songs Category:Joan Baez songs
title: Blowin' in the Wind
